svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Working children out of school (ages 7-14) vs Hours worked by children (ages
The vertical axis shows out-of-school working children as a share of all working children (ages 7-14). The horizontal axis shows
average weekly hours worked by working children (including working children in and out of school). Working children are those
involved in economic activity for at least one hour in the reference week of the survey.
Average weekly working hours of children (ages 7-14)
Out-of-school working children as a share of all working children
